about_the_game:
Meet Rusty, a goofy but shy alien, and help him find his way back home in Rusty's Adventure! 

Join Rusty as he navigates through 6 distinct worlds, each filled with challenging puzzles and precise platforming. Scattered across these worlds are batteries that power the portals Rusty needs to travel back home. But beware—each world comes with its own set of tough obstacles and mysterious puzzles, testing even the most experienced of platform players.

Do you have what it takes to guide Rusty home? He's counting on YOU!

NOTICE! Some dialog includes words/references that may be sensitive to some players.

Features:

  • Explore 6 worlds filled with unique mechanics that keep it fresh and thrilling.

  • Jam out to an original soundtrack packed with catchy, unforgettable melodies!

    • Purchase the soundtrack here.

  • Equip Rusty with fun and stylish gear purchased using the coins you find throughout your adventure.

  • Collect hidden stickers throughout the game, some of which contain references to previous titles. See if you can collect them all!

  • Enjoy humorous dialog and references to popular media as you meet Rusty's friends during your journey.

  • Explosions. Lots and lots of explosions.

name: Rusty's Adventure

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 320 MB available space
